sentence.value: Richard Noel "Dick" Richards (born August 24, 1946) is an American aviator, retired U.S. Navy officer, and a former NASA astronaut.
sentence.annotated-sentence: Richard [[Noel|David_Noel]] "[[Dick|The_Dicks]]" Richards (born August 24, 1946) is an [[American|United_States]] [[aviator|The_Aviator_(1985_film)]], retired [[U.S.|United_States]] [[Navy officer|Officer_(armed_forces)]], and a former [[NASA|NASA]] [[astronaut|Astronaut]].

sentence.value: Mission highlights included: the first use of a space based laser for environmental research; deployment and retrieval of a spacecraft in support of solar wind and corona studies; robotic processing of semiconductors; maneuvered the robotic arm in proximity to over 100 Shuttle reaction control system jet firings to measure forces imparted to a plume detection instrument in support of future Space Station/Shuttle rendezvous flights; first untethered spacewalk in 10 years to test a self-rescue jetpack.
